data.price: Und diejenigen, die sagen: „Unser Herr, schenke uns an unseren Gattinnen und unseren Nachkommenschaften Grund zur Freude, und mache uns für die Rechtschaffenen zu einem Vorbild.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعۡيُنٖ وَٱجۡعَلۡنَا لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا

dua.name: Dua for Family and Offspring
dua.significanceReason: Requests blessing for family, seeking righteous descendants and marital harmony. Popular among married couples and those desiring children.
